import '../../index.scss' import '../../style/member/member_pdcard2.scss' import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import MemberCard from '../../components/Member/MemberCard' import MemberNavlist from '../../components/Member/MemberNavlist' import '../../style/member/member_navbar2.scss' import { Card, Button, Accordion, Modal, Spinner } from 'react-bootstrap' import { MdVisibility, MdFormatListBulleted, MdPlaylistAddCheck, MdFormatListNumbered, MdDescription, MdClear, } from 'react-icons/md' import { devUrl } from '../../config' import Axios from 'axios' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { DateConvert, TimeConvert, } from '../../components/Main/DateTimeConverter' function MemberMyOrder(props) { const [membereventorder, setMemberEventorder] = useState([]) const [memberevent, setMemberEvent] = useState([]) const [events, setEvents] = useState([]) const [att, setAtt] = useState([]) const [show, setShow] = useState(false) const handleClose = () => setShow(false) const handleShow = () => setShow(true) const getEvent = async () => { await Axios.get( `http://localhost:3001/member/get/order/event/${props.match.params.id}` ) .then((res) => { console.log(res) setMemberEventorder(res.data) if (res.data) { setMemberEvent(res.data[0]) console.log(JSON.parse(res.data[0].event_id)) setEvents(JSON.parse(res.data[0].event_id)) } else { return } }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error) }) } const getAtt = async () => { await Axios.get( `http://localhost:3001/member/order/event/att?id=${events.join(',')}` ) .then((res) => { if (res.data) { setAtt(res.data) console.log(res.data) } else { return } }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error) }) } useEffect(() => { getEvent() }, []) useEffect(() => { if (events.length > 0) { getAtt() } }, [events]) const delorder = (order_id) => { console.log(order_id) Axios.put('http://localhost:3001/member/update/eventorder', { order_id: order_id, }).then((res) => { setMemberEventorder( membereventorder.map((list) => { return list.order_id === order_id ? { order_id: list.order_id, } : list }) ) handleClose }) } return ( <>
